name: True Nobility
description:
True Nobility, a game where you must fight your past self in glorious combat to prove that you've grown as a person or...something.

You and your past self each have 3 lives, click to dash into yourself in order to deal damage...but be careful! If you touch your past self outside of a dash you will be the one who gets injured!

Controls:

  • A and D to move left and right.
  • Space to jump
  • Click to dash towards the mouse, damage the enemy by dashing into them.
